products.title: Devon Whisper White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Devon Whisper White Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £15.13 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, our Devon range of roller blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Whisper white is a stylish, soft white shade. Contemporary and modern this will be a welcome addition to home interiors.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2242 Fabric Colour: Whisper White Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
